thāvareyya：n．[cf．thavira，thera] 長老的地位，上座位．
thāvareyya：n．[cf．thavira，thera] 長老の地位，上座位．

thāvareyya： thāvareyya（na）
ထာဝရေယျ（န）
[thāvara+ṇeyya]
[ထာဝရ+ဏေယျ]

Thāvareyya，（nt．） [from thāvara<sup>2</sup>] the rank of a Thera．A．I，38； II，23．This has nothing to do with seniority．It is quite clear from the context that Thera is to be taken here in the secondary sense explained under Thera．He was a bhikkhu so eminently useful to the community that his fellow bhikkhus called him Thera．（Page 309）

thāvareyya：ထာဝရေယျ（န）
[ထာဝရ+ဏေယျ]
တည်တံ့-ခိုင်မြဲ-သည်၏အဖြစ်။

thāvareyya：ထာဝရေယျ （န）
အမြဲတည်သော သဘော။ မထေရ်၏အဖြစ်။ မထေရ်၏ဂုဏ်ရည်။
